title: HiSciFi - Grand Theft Childhood, DeadWorld & Allison and Lillia
description:
www.HiSciFi.com - 

Irma and Jevon Interview Dr. Cheryl K. Olson, one of the authors and part of the team behind the interesting book and study on youth violence and video games entitled, Grand Theft Childhood? It is out now so go read it. We also talk with another author, Dennis Dufour, the author of Dead World about all things zombies! Go read his stuff too.
